solution_line_template: Roger rode for {morning_miles} miles in the morning, and then {multiplier_evening} times that in the evening for {multiplier_evening}*{morning_miles}={evening_miles} miles ridden in the evening
In total, that means Roger rode {morning_miles}+{evening_miles}=<<{morning_miles}+{evening_miles}={total_miles}>>{total_miles} miles over the course of the day.
